## Math2D.computeSquaredLineLength() function

Computes the squared length of a line.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
function computeSquaredLineLength(line: number[]): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  line | number\[\] | An array of that forms a line via \[x,y,z,x,y,z,...\] tuples. |

<b>Returns:</b>

number
